summary: Adds six new spells, including four dragon breath attacks.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds seven new spells, including four dragon breath attacks.

Item codes:(replace xx with the mod load order)

player.additem xx00102B 1	 (Spell Tome: Fortify Destructive Power (increase spell damage 50%)
player.additem xx001017 1		(Spell Tome: Circle of Healing 20 pts 30 sec)
player.additem xx001011 1		(Spell Tome: Frost Projectile 100 dmg)
player.additem xx001010 1		(Spell Tome: Dragon Frost 100 dmg sec)
player.additem xx001009 1		(Spell Tome: Dragon Fire 100 dmg sec)
player.additem xx00100C 1		(Spell Tome: Fire Projectile 100 dmg)
player.additem xx001003 1		(Spell Tome: Devour Health 40 hp sec)

Note: the spells may not be balanced yet but this will be fixed. This is my first mod.
author: morshu2
